snippet: A state court delayed the trial of Beate Zschäpe after weeks of outrage over how seats for members of the foreign news media were allocated.
abstract: State court in Munich delays opening of trial of Beate Zschape, sole survivor of neo-Nazi cell that killed 10 people, to develop new accreditation process to determine how seats for members of foreign news media are allocated; decision is made in response to weeks of outrage after it becomes clear no Turkish journalists had been guaranteed seat in courtroom.
lead_paragraph: A state court delayed the trial of Beate Zschäpe after weeks of outrage over how seats for members of the foreign news media were allocated.

headline.seo: Trial of German Neo-Nazi Is Delayed Over Media Concerns
headline.main: Trial of a Neo-Nazi in Germany Is Delayed Over Media Concerns
headline.print_headline: Trial of a Neo-Nazi in Germany Is Delayed Over Media Concerns
